ðŸ“– Summary: Dockerify Android provides a Dockerized Android emulator that supports multiple CPU architectures, offering native performance and seamless ADB & Web access. It enables developers to efficiently run Android virtual devices within Docker containers, facilitating scalable testing and development. Key features include a web interface, root access with Magisk, and support for ADB and scrcpy.
